thread.section_title: iQ Hotel Roma - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Don't look any further
thread.title_full: Don't look any further - Review of iQ Hotel Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: anne9293
title: Don't look any further
text:
This is the best price/quality ratio for a hotel that you can get in Rome :
- A very clean, quiet and spatious room, including a comfortable bathroom (with slippers !), a large tv with channels in all kinds of languages. My room had a balcony.
- A great breakfast, lots of choices and freshly squeezed orange juice.
- A quiet corner with Apple computers to do some work or to read the mails.
- A free water bottle in the room and more for sale for only 0.5 euro.
- Friendly and helpful staff at the reception, for the cleaning of the room and in the breakfast room.
- Excellently situated at 10 minutes walk from the Termini station and at 5 minutes walk from the metro entrance. Plenty of historical and touristical sites in the neighborhood. E.g. The Santa Maria Maggiore is at 5 minutes walk and worth the visit.
If I go back to Rome, this will be my hotel again !
